mapper.select: select b.no, b.title, u.name, b.content, b.hit, b.reg_date as regDate, b.user_no as userNo from board b inner join users u on b.user_no = u.no order by b.no
select b.no, b.title, u.name, b.content, b.hit, b.reg_date as regDate, b.user_no as userNo from board b inner join users u on b.user_no = u.no where b.no = #{no}
mapper.insert: insert into board (title, content, reg_date, user_no) values (#{title}, #{content}, now(), #{userNo})
